name: Palletizer
description:
Palletizer is an automation game where you have to deal with a lot of colors without losing your cool.

Build creative contraptions to simplify your colors and see how high of a score you can get.

----------------

Controls:

Designed for mouse and keyboard.
- W A S D - move camera
- Scroll Wheel - zoom camera
- Left Click - Interact and Delete Lines
- Hold Left Click - Repair Machine
